description: Custom AI chatbots trained on your data. Integrate into your website to increase customer engagement and capture leads. Start Today!
title: Chatbit â€“ AI Chatbots for Your Website
introduction: Chatbit is an AI chatbot solution designed to boost engagement, answer questions, and capture leads on your website. It allows you to create a bot, add custom data sources, and share it on your website in under 5 minutes.
features: Add custom data sources with up to 11 million characters of context
Customize chatbot appearance including colors, position, logo, and name
Capture leads from visitors who interact with the chatbot
targetPeople: Businesses looking to enhance website engagement and lead generation through AI chatbots

faqs.question: What is Chatbit?
faqs.answer: Chatbit is an AI chatbot solution designed to boost engagement, answer questions, and capture leads on your website.

faqs.question: In what format can I upload the data?
faqs.answer: You can upload files or provide text to add custom data sources.

faqs.question: Can I fine-tune the responses?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can fine-tune the responses to better match your business needs.

faqs.question: Is there a free version?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free version available.
